metadata.title: CVE-2018-20430 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: GNU Libextractor through 1.8 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the function history_extract() in plugins/ole2_extractor.c, related to EXTRACTOR_common_convert_to_utf8 in common/convert.c. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled certain specially crafted files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.9-2').
